text: <@U2H3TT8F2> so have you all considered extending the certifications that expire during this interim period, so we don’t have to explain to clients “we’re not certified anymore, but it’s only because HubSpot’s in the middle of a curriculum rebuild?”
when we have to explain something like that, it makes both us and HubSpot look kinda disorganized.
Ill pass this onto the Academy team and let you know what I hear back <@UDEASNWEB> :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm working through the certification videos and have a question on setting up the local development tooling.. I have Visual Studio Code open and ran the command npm install @HubSpot/cms-cli, but it says bash: npm: command not found. Is there a step I missed?
<@U01SRM259PV>, is your recent note regarding out of date lectures relevant to my question here?
Hey <@U01TKDUSYUA>!  Make sure you have node installed as well!
